forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
